subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic’s five-set victory over John Isner sent Serbia to the quarterfinals and handed the Americans a first-round elimination for the first time since 2005.
snippet: Novak Djokovic’s five-set victory over John Isner sent Serbia to the quarterfinals and handed the Americans a first-round elimination for the first time since 2005.
